segments.text: I see the woman is so engrossed in her task, it's like she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she hasn't noticed a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so mischievous, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad watching the boy risk his safety for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so eager, her hand is open and ready to receive a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is creating such a mess, and the woman is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen when she finally notices the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined, stretching as far as he can to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit sorry for the woman, she's going to have a big mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is a mix of sadness and amusement, watching the children's antics and the woman's obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
